Info.Name: Settings
Info.Description: Holds all settings nodes for your site

Info.Name: Theme
Info.Description: Settings for colors, fonts, logos and much more

GenericProperty.Name: Show Theme Explorer
GenericProperty.Description: Displays a toolbar in the top right corner of the site, allowing you to test different theme settings for colors, fonts etc.

GenericProperty.Name: Logo On Dark
GenericProperty.Description: Logo that works on a dark background, recommended format .svg

GenericProperty.Name: Logo On Light
GenericProperty.Description: Logo that works on a light background

GenericProperty.Name: Favicon
GenericProperty.Description: Select a square .png image. 192px x 192px for best result

GenericProperty.Name: App Icon
GenericProperty.Description: Select a square .png image with background color. 180px x 180px for best result

GenericProperty.Name: Icon Background Color
GenericProperty.Description: In some cases your favicon will be shown with a background color, enter the hex value of that color, include #

GenericProperty.Name: "To top"-button color
GenericProperty.Description: Set the color of the "scroll to top"-button visible in the lower right corner

GenericProperty.Name: Theme Contrast
GenericProperty.Description: Color of text placed over the theme color. Default: #FFF

GenericProperty.Name: Theme Alt Contrast
GenericProperty.Description: Color of text placed over the alternative theme color. Default: #FFF

GenericProperty.Name: Heading Dark
GenericProperty.Description: Color of headings on light background. Default: #111

GenericProperty.Name: Text Dark
GenericProperty.Description: Color of text on light background. Default: #444

GenericProperty.Name: Heading Light
GenericProperty.Description: Color of headings on dark background. Default: #FFF

GenericProperty.Name: Text Light
GenericProperty.Description: Color of text on dark background. Default: #FFF

GenericProperty.Name: Selected Navigation Item
GenericProperty.Description: Color of selected item in the main navigation. Default is Theme Color

GenericProperty.Name: Embed Font
GenericProperty.Description: This html code will be placed in the <head>

GenericProperty.Name: Height Mobile
GenericProperty.Description: Height of the header on mobile. Default: 50px

GenericProperty.Name: Logo Padding
GenericProperty.Description: Padding over and under the logo. Default: 17px

GenericProperty.Name: Logo Padding Mobile
GenericProperty.Description: Padding over and under the logo on mobile. Default: 12px

GenericProperty.Name: Navigation Padding Smaller Screens
GenericProperty.Description: Padding around navigation items on smaller screens. Default: 15px

GenericProperty.Name: Grid Gutter Medium
GenericProperty.Description: Space between columns on tablets. Default: 15px

GenericProperty.Name: Grid Gutter Small
GenericProperty.Description: Space between columns on mobile. Default: 15px

GenericProperty.Name: Grid Gutter XS
GenericProperty.Description: Space between columns on smaller mobiles. Default: 15px
